758290.name: Gloria Victis - Supporter Pack
758290.description:
Forge your eternal fame!
Get this DLC to earn:
- A special in-game title for your characters.
- Three unique heraldic symbols, which can be acquired only by the Supporter Pack.
- 300 Amber currency - Ambers can be spent on items like skins.
- You will also receive two exclusive documents created with a dedication to our players: Awakening of the World and the Song of Creation. These texts, based on the unique and immersive Gloria Victis lore, will give you a firsthand look at the beliefs of two of three nations inhabiting the game’s world: proud and honorable knights of the Kingdom of Midland and furious, vengeful Ismir raiders from the frosty North. Learn about the everlasting powers each of these factions pray to before entering a battle and how they shaped the world in the beginning of time.
- .stl file allowing you to 3D print your own figurine.

Don’t wait – get immersed now!
758290.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 保加利亚语, 荷兰语, 波兰语*, 俄语, 意大利语, 希腊语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 瑞典语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 土耳其语, 法语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
